game.name: Tree Simulator 2022
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: It's exactly what it sounds like, but now with 100% more multiplayer. You are the tree and so is everyone else! You are equaled by no other, except maybe the forest... Relax and be the best tree you can be.
game.shortDescriptionEn: It's exactly what it sounds like, but now with 100% more multiplayer. You are the tree and so is everyone else! You are equaled by no other, except maybe the forest... Relax and be the best tree you can be.
